item.description:
Please check out Sarah's and Kate's (yeah, that's me) pieces in the Files section for this workshop meetup.

Also, rumor has it that we will be celebrating some November awesomeness (including John's b-day) after the meetup (since, of course, some lucky folks have Weds off!) So come ready to workshop AND party! Details about partying location to come.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We usually try to save the big long table by the back.
item.name: November is Awesome Workshop and Merriment Meetup
